alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:35PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Calhoun, eastern Barnwell, Bamberg, southeastern Lexington and western Orangeburg Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Gaston to 6 miles north of Denmark to near Appleton. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Brookdale, Blackville, St. Matthews, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Barnwell State Park, Rivers Bridge State Park, Edisto Gardens, Swansea, North, Ehrhardt, Springfield, Hilda, Neeses and Norway. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 131 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg
